T02D1978:152b-0: @152b # // dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1978:152b-1: gang gis bsnyen sgrub las rnams sbyor 'dod pas //
T02D1978:152b-2: de rnams dgos par bcas pa shes don du //
T02D1978:152b-3: de yi mtshan nyid bde bar 'dir ni bstan par bya /
T02D1978:152b-4: ji srid ting nge 'dzin sngags dang mchod par ldan pa yis //
T02D1978:152b-5: lha nye rtse gcig mtshan ma thob pa bsnyen par gsungs //
T02D1978:152b-6: rtags thob gyur nas dben par song ste glal dang sbrid pa dang /
T02D1978:152b-7: gnyid spangs brtul zhugs bcas pas legs bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1978:152b-8: bsgrubs pas gdul bya'i rang bzhin sna tshogs bzlas pa la //
T02D1978:152b-9: zhi ba la sogs thabs kyi 'byor pa las su gsungs //
T02D1978:152b-10: de la las grub pa yi rgyu gsum ste //
T02D1978:152b-11: rtse gcig pa thob pas chos la dbang sgyur ba dang /
T02D1978:152b-12: sngags grub pas ngag dben pa thob pa dang /
T02D1978:152b-13: dam la gnas pas dam tshig can stong grogs byed pa'o //
T02D1978:152b-15: dad pa mi ldog pa dang /
T02D1978:152b-16: shes rab kyis the tshom mi za ba dang /
T02D1978:152b-17: sems rtse gcig pa dang shin tu gsal ba rnams so //
T02D1978:153a-0: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gang bsgrub kyang tha mal @153a * //
T02D1978:153a-1: pa'i chags sdang ni bar chod kyi sgrib pa chen po yin no //
T02D1978:153a-2: dbang dang dam tshig med na 'di dang pha rol tu sdug bsngal 'byung ngo //
T02D1978:153a-3: ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan blangs la skyon spangs te /
T02D1978:153a-4: lha yi bsnyen pa ni dang por khrus byas la stan bde ba la 'dug ste ;
T02D1978:153a-5: mandala byi dor byas la me tog gi gcal bkram /
T02D1978:153a-6: sku gzugs mdun du bzhag la /
T02D1978:153a-7: bsod nams kyi tshogs yan lag bdun gyi sgo nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed de /
T02D1978:153a-8: snying ga'i padmar nyi ma la gnas pa'i sems dpa'i
T02D1978:153a-9: 'od zer gyis dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'og nas
T02D1978:153a-10: 'byung ba lta bu spyan drangs te /
T02D1978:153a-11: mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la 'di ltar yan lag bdun gyi smon lam bya'o //
T02D1978:153a-12: mchod pa bla na med pa kun du bzang po'i
T02D1978:153a-13: mchod sprin 'dod yon gyi char dag pa'i sems kyis
T02D1978:153a-15: thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis bzhes su gsol /
T02D1978:153a-16: na mo dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thugs
T02D1978:153a-17: kyi gzugs brnyan sku yi sprul pa gsung gi dbang
T02D1978:153a-18: phyug / dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa
T02D1978:153a-19: phyogs bcu na bzhugs so 'tshal la /
T02D1978:153a-20: bdag lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1978:153a-21: gzhan yang bdag gis thog ma med pa'i dus na
T02D1978:153a-22: dug gsum gyi dbang gis sdig pa mi dge ba
T02D1978:153a-23: ci bgyis pa rnams so sor bshags shing slan chad
T02D1978:153a-25: phyogs bcu'i 'phags pa rnams dang 'gro ba dag gi
T02D1978:153a-26: bsod nams kyi tshogs bskyed do 'tshal la rjes su
T02D1978:153a-28: ston pa 'jig rten gyi sgron ma bskul ba'i sa
T02D1978:153a-29: las bzhes pa gang dag bzhugs so 'tshal de dag
T02D1978:153a-30: la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul lo //
T02D1978:153a-31: bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'dul ba'i dus la
T02D1978:153a-32: ma bab pa log par lta ba rnams sun dbyung
T02D1978:153a-33: ba'i phyir / thabs kyis mya ngan las 'da' bar
T02D1978:153a-34: bzhed pa rnams la 'khor ba ji srid par don
T02D1978:153a-36: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang gzhan yang bdag
T02D1978:153b-0: dang 'gro ba kun gyis bgyis so 'tshal @153b gyi
T02D1978:153b-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang bla na med
T02D1978:153b-2: pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyi'o //
T02D1978:153b-3: ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs
T02D1978:153b-4: byang chub mchog tu bskyed pa phung po dang khams
T02D1978:153b-5: dang skye mched dang bral ba gzung ba dang 'dzin
T02D1978:153b-7: chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid rang gi sems gdod ma nas ma skyes pa /
T02D1978:153b-8: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du thugs bskyed pa de ltar bdag gis kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D1978:153b-9: bdag gis 'phags pa rnams la lus phul te sems
T02D1978:153b-10: can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho na gnas pa rnams bsgral
T02D1978:153b-11: ba'i ched du bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje
T02D1978:153b-12: bsgrubs te / sems can rnams mya ngan las 'da' bar bgyi'o //
T02D1978:153b-13: de nas tshad med pa bzhis sems dag par bya'o //
T02D1978:153b-14: da ni ye shes kyi tshogs su gyur pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1978:153b-15: snang ba'i chos thams cad ni sems nyid 'khrul pa tsam ste gud na med do //
T02D1978:153b-16: sems ni sgyu ma lta bur rang bzhin med pa ste /
T02D1978:153b-17: de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'o zhes
T02D1978:153b-18: shes par byas la gsang sngags 'dis stong pa nyid
T02D1978:153b-20: aom sva bh'a wa bi shuddh'a: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a wa bi shuddho& ham /
T02D1978:153b-21: zhes pas thams cad dag pa'o ;
T02D1978:153b-22: / de nas yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du /
T02D1978:153b-23: aa dang po las zla bar gyur pa /
T02D1978:153b-24: de'i steng du dh'i: 'od du zhu ba las ral gri /
T02D1978:153b-25: ral gri'i lte ba la yi ge dh'i: gser btso
T02D1978:153b-26: ma'i kha dog lta bu las yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D1978:153b-27: 'jam pa'i rdo rje mdog ser po autpala bsnams shing
T02D1978:153b-28: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya can /
T02D1978:153b-29: gzhon nu zur phud can mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bsgom /
T02D1978:153b-30: de'i thugs kar aa gnyis pa las grub pa'i nyi
T02D1978:153b-31: ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i phreng ba can du bsams
T02D1978:153b-32: te / de'i 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa rnams bskul nas /
T02D1978:153b-33: slar zhugs pas 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid dang sangs
T02D1978:153b-34: rgyas rnams su bcas te nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D1978:153b-35: thim pas shin tu gzi byin dang ldan par gyur
T02D1978:153b-36: te / 'od zer 'bar bas kun du khyab cing 'phro bar bsgom mo //
T02D1978:153b-37: de'i steng du h'um nag po'o //
T02D1978:154a-1: byas te slar bsdus pa'i sbyor bas khro bo'i rdo rje rab tu 'phro ba can du gyur te /
T02D1978:154a-2: don gyi bya ba byas nas rgyal ba sras dang
T02D1978:154a-3: bcas pa spyan drangs nas rdo rje de nyid la
T02D1978:154a-4: bzhugs pas sku gsung thugs rdo rje dbyings nyid dang
T02D1978:154a-6: de nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs su gyur par bya'o //
T02D1978:154a-7: 'di lta ste sku bskal pa me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil na bzhugs shing /
T02D1978:154a-8: zhal khro gnyer smin ma 'gyur ba /
T02D1978:154a-9: me 'bar ba rdo rje rta gad chen po 'byin cing lce 'jib pa /
T02D1978:154a-10: phe skad chen po gnam du 'don cing 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po'i khrag gsol zhing /
T02D1978:154a-11: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad bsdigs pa /
T02D1978:154a-12: sku gcer pu thod pas brgyan pa /
T02D1978:154a-15: ma he'i gdong chen po ste /
T02D1978:154a-16: 'di dbu dgu pa phyag sum cu rtsa bzhi pa /
T02D1978:154a-17: zhabs bcu drug pa g-yon brkyang ba'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa /
T02D1978:154a-18: zhal g-yas dang po sngon po /
T02D1978:154a-22: g-yon pa'i zhal gsum ni dkar po dang /
T02D1978:154a-26: rtsa ba'i zhal ma he nag po kha gdangs pa ste lce 'dril ba'o //
T02D1978:154a-27: rva gnyis kyi dbus kyi zhal dmar po 'jigs pa ste zhal nas khrag 'dzag pa'o //
T02D1978:154a-28: steng gi zhal ser po cung zad khro ba gzhon nu'i tshul can gtsug phud lnga pa ste /
T02D1978:154a-29: thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa'o //
T02D1978:154a-30: phyag g-yas g-yon gyi dang pos glang po che'i pags pa brgyangs te 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1978:154a-31: g-yas pa gzhan ni rim pa bzhin du gri dang /
T02D1978:154a-46: rje chung dang de rnams bsnams pa'o //
T02D1978:154a-47: phyag g-yon na thod pa dang /
T02D1978:154b-1: rtsang chen gyis phug pa'i ro dang /
T02D1978:154b-2: me thab dang thod tshal dang //
T02D1978:154b-5: rlung gis phyar ba'i ras dang de rnams bsnams pa'o //
T02D1978:154b-6: zhabs g-yas pa brgyad kyis mi dang ma he dang /
T02D1978:154b-12: wa dang de rnams brdzis pa'o //
T02D1978:154b-20: ri skegs dang de rnams brdzis pa'o //
T02D1978:154b-21: de'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpas mtshon pa /
T02D1978:154b-22: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D1978:154b-24: de nas ae yam ram kham lam sum bhr'um /
T02D1978:154b-25: zhes brjod 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1978:154b-26: steng na gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo khyud dang
T02D1978:154b-27: ldan pa / dur khrod 'bar ba'i klong na gnas pa cig bsgom mo //
T02D1978:154b-28: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na ro chen po'i steng du
T02D1978:154b-29: ji skad smos pa'i sems can rnams kyi gdan la
T02D1978:154b-30: / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po bdag dang mthun par bskyed do //
T02D1978:154b-31: grva bzhi ru mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi dang /
T02D1978:154b-32: sgo bzhir sgo ma bzhi khro bo'i cha byad can yi ge ya las bskyed do //
T02D1978:154b-33: de'i phyi rol du las kyi gshin rje pho mo
T02D1978:154b-34: mkha' 'gro ma dang 'byung po'i tshogs bskyed par bsgom
T02D1978:154b-35: ste / de'i lho phyogs kyi sgor bcom ldan 'das
T02D1978:154b-36: kyi mdun du bdag dam tshig sems par gnas par
T02D1978:154b-37: ste / bsgom mo // de ltar gsal ba dang
T02D1978:154b-38: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang
T02D1978:154b-40: 'jam dpal rang bzhin chos rnams kun gyi dngos //
T02D1978:154b-41: gnas med 'gro 'ong bral ba nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D1978:154b-42: dus kyi khams bzhin thugs rjes 'gro 'ong bral //
T02D1978:154b-43: sprul pa'i 'gro dang bral ba gzugs brnyan bzhin //
T02D1978:154b-44: 'gro dang 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid mi mnga' yang//
T02D1978:154b-45: chu zla bzhin du dmigs der snang ba'o //
T02D1978:154b-46: deng 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol ba'i lha //
T02D1978:154b-47: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'jam pa'i dbyangs //
T02D1978:154b-48: gdug pa 'dul byed 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed //
T02D1978:154b-49: ye shes thugs las sprul pa'i lha mos bskor //
T02D1978:155a-1: sprul pa gshin rje 'khor dang bcas //
T02D1978:155a-2: 'dir gshegs brtan par bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D1978:155a-3: aom hr'i: bho bho ma h'a kro dha a'a gtstsha
T02D1978:155a-4: aasma ta p'u dza pra ti grihna pra s'a dham
T02D1978:155a-5: me dh'i: mam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1978:155a-6: zhes pas gnyis su med par bya'o //
T02D1978:155a-7: gnyis med thun mong ma yin khyab pa'i sku //
T02D1978:155a-8: kun la snyoms mdzad rgyal ba kun gyi yab //
T02D1978:155a-9: chos kyi dbyings gyur rgyal ba kun gyi yum //
T02D1978:155a-10: ye shes sems dpa' rgyal ba kun gyi sras //
T02D1978:155a-11: phyag 'tshal 'jam dpal dpal gyur rdzogs pa khyod //
T02D1978:155a-12: chos kyi sku la byams sdang mi mnga' yang //
T02D1978:155a-13: srid gsum gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir //
T02D1978:155a-14: thugs rje'i thabs kyis khro rgyal skur bstan pa //
T02D1978:155a-15: 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1978:155a-16: dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes ni //
T02D1978:155a-17: chos rnams kun dang rang bzhin dbyer med de //
T02D1978:155a-18: sgrub mchog bdag gis sems kyang de lags pas //
T02D1978:155a-19: de mtshon don phyir rtags kyi skur bstan pa //
T02D1978:155a-20: thugs la gnas pa'i ye shes 'phro ba'i rgya //
T02D1978:155a-21: ye shes sems dpa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1978:155a-22: bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan rmad po che //
T02D1978:155a-23: bsam 'das brjod bral dpag gis mi lang yang //
T02D1978:155a-24: mi phyed rdo rje gsum du 'dus bstan pa //
T02D1978:155a-25: sku gsung thugs kyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1978:155a-26: bde gshegs pa thams cad mnyam nyid chos kyi sku //
T02D1978:155a-27: rang bzhin rnam dag rigs rgyud mi mnga' yang //
T02D1978:155a-28: rnal 'byor grub pa mtshon phyir rgyas btab pa //
T02D1978:155a-29: dbu rgyan rdo rje mtshon la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1978:155a-30: ye shes snang med chags pa'i rdul bral zhing //
T02D1978:155a-31: 'dod pa khams kyi sems can 'dul slad du //
T02D1978:155a-32: thabs la mkhas pa'i 'dod yon gzugs su sprul //
T02D1978:155a-33: mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1978:155a-34: chos nyid spros bral dbyings kyi pho brang du //
T02D1978:155a-35: gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes zlos 'jug phyir //
T02D1978:155a-36: 'khrul ba'i bgegs tshogs gdul ba'i skur bstan pa //
T02D1978:155a-37: gzhal yas sgo skyong bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1978:155a-38: bcom ldan rdo rje chos rje 'jam dbyangs spyan lam du //
T02D1978:155a-39: bdud 'dul bstan pa bsrung bar zhal 'ches pa //
T02D1978:155b-0: las kyi gshin @155b rje mang po mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1978:155b-1: 'byung po ro langs ci bgyi bka' nyan tshogs //
T02D1978:155b-2: phyi nang skyong ba'i dam can ma lus la //
T02D1978:155b-3: bdag ni re ba'i sems kyis 'dud cing mchis //
T02D1978:155b-5: rgyal ba rnams ni gtsang gyur cing //
T02D1978:155b-6: sme ba'i rtog pa mi mnga' yang //
T02D1978:155b-7: sri zhu tshul gyis yon chab 'di //
T02D1978:155b-8: bde gshegs rnams la sku khrus gsol //
T02D1978:155b-10: aom h'um phat phat bsang gtor gyi'o //
T02D1978:155b-11: rgyal ba rnams ni yon tan mchog gi sku //
T02D1978:155b-12: tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i dri ngad ldan //
T02D1978:155b-13: byang chub yan lag brgyad pa me tog mdzes ;
T02D1978:155b-14: / ma rig mun pa bral ba ye shes gsol //
T02D1978:155b-15: nor bdun yon tan chog shes bdud rtsi zas //
T02D1978:155b-16: ye shes pho brang mtshan gyi me tog spos //
T02D1978:155b-17: sgyu ma'i chos la ye shes dbang sgyur zhing //
T02D1978:155b-18: rang bzhin rnam dag rigs rgyud mi mnga' yang //
T02D1978:155b-19: bdag cag sri zhu gus pa'i tshul gyis su ;
T02D1978:155b-20: / dri dang bdug pa me tog mar me bshos //
T02D1978:155b-21: dag cing gtsang mar bshams te phul ba 'dis //
T02D1978:155b-22: bsod nams yan lag yongs su rdzogs gyur cig /
T02D1978:155b-23: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a du shta sa tva
T02D1978:155b-25: aom ku m'a ra r'u pi ni dzdza: h'um phat me tog gi'o //
T02D1978:155b-26: aom hri: ha: ha: he he phat bdug pa'i'o //
T02D1978:155b-27: aom d'ipta lo tsa na bi kri ta a'a na
T02D1978:155b-28: na ma h'a aatt'atta ha sa na di ni d'ipta
T02D1978:155b-31: aom ka' la r'u pa satva da ma ka nee bi dye p'u dza ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1978:155b-35: 'jam dpal mkha' la 'byung ba'i gser mdog can //
T02D1978:155b-36: 'jam dpal thugs las chos kun rang bzhin gsal //
T02D1978:155b-37: 'jam dpal gsung gi dbang phyug 'jam pa'i dbyangs //
T02D1978:155b-38: 'jam dpal bdag ni re ba'i sems can gyis 'dud //
T02D1978:155b-39: thugs mchog 'jam pa'i ngang las ma g-yos kyang //
T02D1978:155b-40: thugs rjes gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir //
T02D1978:155b-41: gshin rje 'jigs byed chen po'i skur ston pa //
T02D1978:155b-42: mi bzad dus mtha'i bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar //
T02D1978:155b-43: zhal gdangs khro gnyer smin ma glog stong 'gyu //
T02D1978:155b-44: spyan bgrad mche ba gtsigs pa rab tu 'bar //
T02D1978:155b-45: rdo rje rta gad drag po ha har bzhad //
T02D1978:156a-1: 'gro gdug pa'i phem skad gnam du sgrogs //
T02D1978:156a-2: khros pa'i stabs chen brdabs pas khams gsum gnon //
T02D1978:156a-3: sdigs mdzub gnam du bsgreng zhing lha chen 'dul //
T02D1978:156a-4: ljags 'dril tshems chen gtsigs shing khrag gis myos //
T02D1978:156a-5: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zhal du gsol //
T02D1978:156a-6: glang chen ko rlon thod pa'i phreng ba zhags //
T02D1978:156a-7: gcer bu 'jigs byed dbang phyug chen po'i tshul //
T02D1978:156a-8: 'jigs byed ma he khros pa'i zhal gdangs shing //
T02D1978:156a-9: zhal dgu 'bar bar srid pa za zhing rngub //
T02D1978:156a-10: 'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul ba'i phyag rgya 'bar //
T02D1978:156a-11: bdud ris gnon pa'i zhabs ni brkyang bskum mdzad //
T02D1978:156a-12: 'jigs byed chen po'i sku la rtag tu 'dud //
T02D1978:156a-14: g-yas kyi zhal gsum bgrad pa ni //
T02D1978:156a-15: mthing ga dmar dang ser ba'i zhal //
T02D1978:156a-16: g-yon pa'i zhal gsum gdangs pa ni //
T02D1978:156a-17: dkar dang dud ka nag po'i zhal //
T02D1978:156a-18: dbus kyi zhal gsum 'bar ba ni //
T02D1978:156a-19: khro dang chags dang zhi ba'i tshul //
T02D1978:156a-21: g-yas kyi phyag rgya bcu drug ni //
T02D1978:156a-22: rdeg cing 'joms pa'i mtshon cha gdengs //
T02D1978:156a-23: g-yon gyi phyag rgya bcu drug ni //
T02D1978:156a-24: ro stobs pa yi mtshan mas mdzes //
T02D1978:156a-25: brjid gnon zhabs kyi phyag rgya las //
T02D1978:156a-26: g-yas kyi zhabs brgyad bskum pa ni //
T02D1978:156a-27: dregs pa'i lha brgyad thabs kyis gnon //
T02D1978:156a-28: g-yon gyi zhabs brgyad brkyang pa ni //
T02D1978:156a-29: dregs pa'i lha mo brgyad la rol //
T02D1978:156a-31: rtag tu ling+ga rgyas pa'i tshul //
T02D1978:156a-32: drag po'i tshul gyis zhe sdang 'dul //
T02D1978:156a-33: gdul sku khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1978:156a-34: dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas //
T02D1978:156a-35: bdud dang gshin rje thabs kyis 'dul //
T02D1978:156a-36: ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud //
T02D1978:156a-37: dbang sdud khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1978:156a-38: dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas //
T02D1978:156a-39: dbang med dad pas 'dus pa dang //
T02D1978:156a-40: ye shes sprul pa'i 'khor gyis bskor //
T02D1978:156a-42: ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
T02D1978:156a-43: ji lta bur ni sprul gyur nas //
T02D1978:156b-0: rnam dag dbyings las ma @156b g-yos te /
T02D1978:156b-1: mnyam nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1978:156b-2: yon chab dang rol mo'i rdzas kyis kyang mnyes par bya ste /
T02D1978:156b-4: de nas kha zas ci 'byor ba'i gtor ma ram gyis sbyangs te /
T02D1978:156b-5: aa las bdud rtsi chen por gyur pa'i 'od zer
T02D1978:156b-6: las 'dod yon ji lta bar mos pa bzhin du
T02D1978:156b-7: 'byung bar bsams te sngags 'dis 'gro ba kun dang
T02D1978:156b-8: 'khor du bsdus pa rnams la sbyin //
T02D1978:156b-9: aom k'a la r'u pa sarba du shta satva da
T02D1978:156b-10: ma ka ma h'u bh'u ta aa dhi pa ti
T02D1978:156b-11: ai mam ba lim grihna grihn'a pa ya sv'a h'a
T02D1978:156b-12: / zhes lan gsum du brjod de dbul lo //
T02D1978:156b-13: de nas bdag nyid snying gar ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzlas pa'i yi ge bsams te /
T02D1978:156b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar yang de bzhin du
T02D1978:156b-15: dmigs la bdag las yi ge 'phros pas lha'i thugs
T02D1978:156b-16: dam bskul / bdag la thim pas dngos grub kyi dbyig dam pa thob par 'gyur te /
T02D1978:156b-17: mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar rgyun ma chad par bya'o //
T02D1978:156b-18: gtong bar 'dod pa dang mchod par bya ste /
T02D1978:156b-19: mthol bshags byas te bzod par gsol nas ye shes kyi lha slar gshegs su gsol /
T02D1978:156b-20: spros med mkha' ltar khyab pa'i sku mchog ni //
T02D1978:156b-21: mi gnas phyir na gshegs pa mi mnga' yang //
T02D1978:156b-22: sri zhu'i tshul gyis gshegs su gsol ba 'dis //
T02D1978:156b-23: bdag dang gzhan bcas sgrib pa byang gyur cig /
T02D1978:156b-24: aom dza ya dza ya su dza ya bi shva
T02D1978:156b-25: r'u pa dha ri gtstsha gtstsha sva bh'a wa nam
T02D1978:156b-26: kri tam te na ta th'a ga tam shtsa /
T02D1978:156b-28: bi sardza ya ma ma ka ryam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1978:156b-29: de nas dam tshig gi lha bdag la bsdu lus bsrung ba yang bya'o //
